alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:35PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Box Elder County through 315 PM MDT... At 235 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northwest of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, or 30 miles southwest of Snowville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
